name: DoM. Dad or Mom
description:
Game - winner of Global Game Jam Ukraine. It was develop across 48 hours

This game about a child who has known discord in the family, and gathers tears to unite the family again.

Enjoy!:)

Credits:

Ihor Petrynov - Code developer

Mykyta Zakhariev - Character art/animation

Vadym Murashchenko - Level Design

Volodymyr Delinsky - Game/Sound design

Serhii Shamanaiev - Idea, game design, art
